title: JC's Manager
description: JC's Manager (The Cloacan Scrolls)This is THE breadcrumb trail of breadcrumb trails--the route that maps two desert nomads 2000 years through time and fun-nee! From Ancient Rome to modern-day Atlantic City in just under two seconds (and no tolls!), it's a mystery that morphs into something slightly darker with the help of geekazoid Madams, rakish legionarii, technology, baseball, Times Square and a Time Tunnel only a rad Princeton prof can find.
author: R. Ardi
